title: Pritish Nandy Tweets A Photo of ‘Statue of Unity’. Only, It Isn’t!
subtitle: On 8 December, senior journalist and former Rajya Sabha MP Pritish Nandy tweeted a photo of Sardar Vallabhai Patel and a photo of a statue of Patel’s, claiming the latter to be the Statue of Unity.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On 8 December, senior journalist and former Rajya Sabha MP Pritish Nandy tweeted a photo of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel and a photo of Patel’s statue, claiming the latter to be the Statue of Unity.

Nandy, in his tweet, remarked that the statue bore no resemblance to Patel at all.
